title: What time is Salat Ul Jummah in Masjid Al Nabawi Medina (looking for the 26th January 2018)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Assalamu Aalaikum warahmathullahi wabarakaath. Salaat Al jummah in masjid Al nabawi will start as soon as the luzhar Azaan. But the masjid will be over crowded even if you enter 10 mins before Azaan. Lots of people wants to offer their salaat ul jummah in masjid Al nabawi. So All the pilgrims, most of the Madinah residents, All shop keepers and hoteliers will try their best to offer jummah inside masjid Al nabawi. Therefore leave for jummah early as possible, around 1100 would be a ideal time.

Friday prayer is a prayer to pray every week on Friday, an Islamic and social meeting of Muslims and is obligatory on them only in some cases .. What distinguishes the Friday prayer from other prayers is the Friday sermon is a religious advice provided by Muslims to a person reminds them of God and the worship of God is important One of the most important prayers in the life of a Muslim
